body:
Hi All:

I have a grad student who has been working on running Radiance and 3DS Max alongside each other through these test cases - as step one in his understanding of matching real to simulated data. Apart from re-identifying the erroneous data in one of the datasets, and the extreme render settings for convergence for another case, he has identified two reports of work (with Radiance) like this. Anyone know:

a)      How we might get access to the full data

b)      How we might contact these folks?

http://www.diamond-congress.hu/cie2009/03menu/binx/22_Raphael_Labayrade.pdf

http://www.radiance-online.org/radiance-workshop7/Content/Geisler-Moroder/RW2008_DGM_AD.pdf

As Jake notes: "The second looks particularly interesting however I can't find the full set of test cases..."
M

[cid:image001.png at 01CC7DC4.16017CC0]<http://www.victoria.ac.nz/architecture/staff/michael-donn.aspx>

Quality Assurance makes simulation believable


Michael Donn

Victoria University of Wellington School of Architecture
PO Box 600
139 Vivian St
Wellington
New Zealand
